meta.description: CSH labels for the WEC Flash Presentation - Audio Frontend Plugin

languageKey.label: Optional title of the class or video that will appear above the audio presentation.
Optional text that will appear before the audio presentation loads.
Optional background image that will be used behind the audio presentation.
MP3 file to playback in the Flash Audio Presentation.
Bitrate of the MP3 file.
The bitrate is used to determine when slides should change.
Directory that images are stored in, relative to the TYPO3 root.
Example: /fileadmin/images/
Pairing of image filenames and the time that image should be displayed.

image1.jpg 7 image2.jpg 05:15 image3.jpg 01:10:24
This example creates three slide image/timing pairs. The first slide will appear when the video playback reaches 7 second, the second at 5 minutes, 15 seconds, and the third at 1 hour, 10 minutes, 24 seconds. Time should always be entered in the HH:MM:SS format but any time entered will default to the lowest possibility (ex. 7:10 is interpreted as 7 minutes, 10 seconds rather than 7 hours, 10 seconds).
